title: Chouyaku Hyakuninisshu: Uta Koi. (Utakoi)
synopsis: Uta Koi tells the "super-liberal interpretation" of the Hyakuninisshu anthology compiled during Japan's Heian period of 100 romantic poems from 100 different poets such as The Tale of Genji's Murasaki Shikibu.
related_anime: ['Chouyaku Hyakuninisshu: Uta Koi. - Sake to Kikoushi ~ Murasaki Kishikibu to Kintou', 'Chouyaku Hyakuninisshu: Uta Koi.']
